chapter.title: About the Firebird Developer's Guide
chapter.subtitle: for Firebird 3.0
chapter.para: This volume consists of chapters that walk through the development of a simple application for several language platforms, notably Delphi, Microsoft Entity Framework and MVC.NET (Model-View-Controller) for web applications, PHP and Java with the Spring framework. It is hoped that the work will grow in time, with contributions from authors using other stacks with Firebird.

section.title: Translation
section.para: Development of the original Russian version was sponsored by IBSurgeon and Moscow Exchange Bank. A crowd-funding campaign was launched by the Firebird Foundation in 2017 to fund the translation into English to provide this document as the foundation for translation by Firebird Project document writers into other languages.
The campaign suceeded in raising enough to get the process under way.

section.title: . . . and More Translation
section.para: Once the DocBook source appears in GitHub, we hope the trusty translators will start making versions in German, Japanese, Italian, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Czech. Certainly, we never have enough translators so please, you Firebirders who have English as a second language, do consider translating some chapters into your first language.

section.para: We acknowledge these contributions of sponsors and donors with gratitude and thank you all for stepping up.
